Package com.bluegosling.concurrent.executors

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CompletableExecutorService
    An executor service that returns CompletableFutures.
    ContextPropagator<T>
    An object that helps propagate context from one thread to another.
    FluentExecutorService
    An executor service that returns FluentFutures.
    FluentScheduledExecutorService
    A scheduled executor service that returns FluentFutures.
    InterceptingExecutor.Decorator
    A decorator, that can perform actions before and after each task.
    InterceptingExecutor.Interceptor
    An interceptor for tasks.
    InterceptingExecutorService.Decorator
    A decorator, that can perform actions before and after each task.
    InterceptingExecutorService.Interceptor
    An interceptor for tasks.
    SerializingExecutor<K>
    An executor that serializes multiple tasks that correspond to the same key.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActorThreadPool<T>
    A thread pool that runs multiple sequential streams.
    ActorThreadPool.Builder  
    ContextPropagatingExecutor
    An executor that allows for propagation of context from submitting threads to worker threads.
    ContextPropagatingExecutorService
    An executor service that allows for propagation of context from submitting threads to worker threads.
    ContextPropagatingScheduledExecutorService
    A scheduled executor service that allows for propagation of context from submitting threads to worker threads.
    InterceptingExecutor
    An executor that provides an interceptor pattern, to apply cross-cutting concerns in the course of executing tasks.
    InterceptingExecutor.Decorator.Builder
    Builds a decorator, composing up to three functional interfaces.
    InterceptingExecutor.Interceptor.ListBuilder
    Builds a list of interceptors.
    InterceptingExecutorService
    An executor service that provides an interceptor pattern, to apply cross-cutting concerns in the course of executing tasks.
    InterceptingExecutorService.Decorator.Builder
    Builds a decorator, composing up to three functional interfaces.
    InterceptingExecutorService.Interceptor.ListBuilder
    Builds a list of interceptors.
    InterceptingScheduledExecutorService
    A InterceptingExecutorService that provides the facility to schedule tasks.
    PipeliningExecutor<K>
    An executor that runs multiple sequential pipelines.
    SameThreadExecutor
    A simple executor that runs each task synchronously in the same thread that submits it.
    ThreadLimitingExecutorService
    An executor service that uses threads from another executor but imposes limits on parallelism and the number of threads used for its tasks.
    WorkSharingThreadPool  
    WrappingExecutor
    An executor that provides a way to wrap tasks that are executed.
    WrappingExecutorService
    An executor service that provides a way to wrap tasks that are executed.
    WrappingScheduledExecutorService
    A scheduled executor service that provides a way to wrap tasks that are executed.
